constraints.name: capacity_constraint
constraints.description: 选取元素权重和不超过容量上限（每个篮子的苹果重量之和分别不超过 a 和 b）
constraints.formal: sum(w_i for w_i in S1) <= a and sum(w_i for w_i in S2) <= b, where S1 and S2 are disjoint subsets of {w_1, w_2, ..., w_n} with w_i <= k

constraints.name: pairwise_exclusion
constraints.description: 选择的元素不能重复（每个苹果只能放入一个篮子或留在桌子上）
constraints.formal: S1 ∩ S2 = ∅, where S1 and S2 are the sets of apples in the two baskets

constraints.name: weight_threshold
constraints.description: 选取元素的权重必须小于等于给定阈值（只有重量不超过 k 的苹果可以放入篮子）
constraints.formal: w_i <= k for all w_i in S1 ∪ S2
